column2: Tufin Software Technologies Ltd. engages in the provision of policy-centric approach to security and IT operations. The firm provides Tufin, a security policy management platform that brings automation and analytics to security and network operations. Tufin enables customers to maintain security across physical networks, hybrid cloud, containers and micro services while simplifying the management of complex networks through a central console for real-time change tracking. The company provides also risk analysis for changes and risky access identification across vendors and platforms, among others.
